headlines.description: Liverpool continued their unbeaten start to the Premier League season with a hard-fought 2-0 win against bottom side Watford.

video.headline: Moreno: There's still a better version of Liverpool out there

headlines.shortLinkText: Salah at the double to beat battling Watford

headlines.description: Burnley ended a three-match losing streak thanks to a Chris Wood header that gave them a 1-0 win over Newcastle United at Turf Moor on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wood header gives Burnley win over Newcastle

headlines.description: Chelsea suffered a shock 1-0 defeat to Bournemouth at Stamford Bridge on Saturday.

video.headline: Chelsea lack players with the 'personality' of a leader

headlines.description: Leicester missed out on the chance to cut Liverpool's lead at the top of the Premier League after a frustrating 1-1 draw against Norwich.

headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester slip allows Liverpool to extend lead

headlines.description: A superb second-half double by midfielder John Fleck sent Sheffield United up to fifth in the Premier League with a 2-0 home win over fellow newcome
headlines.shortLinkText: Sheffield Utd go fifth as Fleck double downs Villa

headlines.description: A long-awaited goal by close-season signing Sebastien Haller earned West Ham United a crucial 1-0 win in a Premier League basement battle at Saints.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham's Haller ends goal drought to earn win
